ISSUE.TITLE: Closing the Help Drawer redirects you the homepage

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Avoid timing out when no timeout is set (#4653) * soft limits should not exceed if they are set to run infinitely * use a variable to explain magic number
